message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90%, and you get 10%.  It's a good starting point for a long and prosperous partnership.
I'm willing to compromise. 60/40 seems like a fairer split, considering we're just starting out.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 65/35, with me taking 65%.  This reflects the changing value of the money and avoids further rounds of negotiation.
